name: Ensure AWS Firewall Manager security policies are compliant
description: Regularly review and ensure that all AWS Firewall Manager security policies defined in the administrator account are compliant with organizational security standards. This includes verifying that policies are correctly applied across accounts and resources, and that they enforce the intended security controls.

name: Implement least privilege access for AWS Firewall Manager
description: Ensure that IAM roles and policies associated with AWS Firewall Manager follow the principle of least privilege. Grant only the necessary permissions required for managing Firewall Manager policies and resources across the organization.

name: Enable AWS Firewall Manager logging
description: Enable logging for AWS Firewall Manager to capture detailed information about policy changes, compliance status, and other relevant events. Configure logs to be sent to a centralized logging solution for analysis and auditing purposes.

name: Implement AWS Firewall Manager policies for WAF
description: Create and maintain AWS Firewall Manager policies to centrally manage AWS WAF rules across accounts and resources in the organization. Ensure that these policies enforce consistent web application firewall protections.

name: Implement AWS Firewall Manager policies for Shield Advanced
description: Create and maintain AWS Firewall Manager policies to centrally manage AWS Shield Advanced protections across accounts and resources in the organization. Ensure that these policies provide consistent DDoS protection for critical resources.

name: Implement AWS Firewall Manager policies for Security Groups
description: Create and maintain AWS Firewall Manager policies to centrally manage Amazon VPC security groups across accounts and resources in the organization. Ensure that these policies enforce consistent network access controls.

name: Regularly review and update AWS Firewall Manager policies
description: Establish a process to regularly review and update AWS Firewall Manager policies to ensure they remain aligned with evolving security requirements and organizational changes. This should include periodic assessments of policy effectiveness and coverage.

name: Implement AWS Firewall Manager policies for Network Firewall
description: Create and maintain AWS Firewall Manager policies to centrally manage AWS Network Firewall rules across accounts and resources in the organization. Ensure that these policies provide consistent network traffic filtering and monitoring.

name: Configure AWS Firewall Manager notifications
description: Set up AWS Firewall Manager notifications to alert administrators about policy violations, non-compliant resources, and other security-related events. Configure notifications to be sent through appropriate channels such as Amazon SNS.

name: Implement AWS Firewall Manager policies for DNS Firewall
description: Create and maintain AWS Firewall Manager policies to centrally manage Route 53 Resolver DNS Firewall rules across accounts and resources in the organization. Ensure that these policies provide consistent DNS-level protection against threats.
